message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "The study analyzed data from the Global Nutrition Report and the Demographic and Health Survey to assess the nutrition status of children under five in low-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Nutrition Report", "Demographic and Health Survey"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "This research uses a unique dataset compiled from administrative data on high-polluting firms and air quality monitoring stations across India.", "dataset": ["administrative data", "air quality monitoring stations"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We combine field experiments with a novel dataset that includes information on all issues to estimate the causal effect of framing on public support for welfare policies in Nigeria.", "dataset": ["novel dataset"], "topic": ["Social Protection"]}, {"sentence": "The article used proprietary data provided by Uber, collision and consumer complaint databases, and alternative data sources such as Yelp and Google Trends to examine ride-sharing safety.", "dataset": ["proprietary data provided by Uber", "collision database", "consumer complaint database"], "topic": ["Transport"]}, {"sentence": "This study draws on a corpus of executive speeches and a dataset of company press releases and earnings calls to analyze the extent to which CEOs manage their firm's political environment.", "dataset": ["corpus of executive speeches", "company press releases", "earnings calls"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We use two datasets containing firm-level data on exports and patents, as well as information on data breaches affecting US firms, to estimate the impact of cybersecurity risks on firm innovation and international competitiveness.", "dataset": ["firm-level data on exports", "patents", "data breaches"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "The research uses the IPUMS International integrated census microdata on population and housing from different countries to evaluate the effectiveness of slum upgrading programs.", "dataset": ["IPUMS International integrated census microdata"], "topic": ["Urban Development"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the distributional effects of multilateral trade reforms on household welfare using a framework that combines household survey data from Living Standards Measurement Study (LSMS) and Global Trade Analysis Project (GTAP) dataset.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study (LSMS)", "Global Trade Analysis Project (GTAP) dataset"], "topic": ["Trade", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze two datasets - one containing detailed information on company financial statements across 43 African countries, and another with data on political institutions across these African states to explore the link between political connections and capital structure decisions in Africa.", "dataset": ["company financial statements", "political institutions"], "topic": ["Financial Sector", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "The research uses qualitative evidence derived from focus group discussions and a large-scale dataset of satellite imagery to evaluate the impact of electrification on income generation, health outcomes, and educational attainment among rural communities in Tanzania.", "dataset": ["large-scale dataset of satellite imagery"], "topic": ["Energy"]}]
